```
fld     [radius]    *; Load radius to ST0*
 *; ST0 <== 0.2345*
fldpi               *; Load PI to ST0*
 *; ST1 <== ST0*
 *; ST0 <== 3.1415926*
fmulp               *; Multiply (ST0 * ST1) and pop*
 *; ST0 = 0.7367034*
fadd    st0, st0    *; * 2*
 *; ST0 = 1.4734069*
fstp    [result]    *; Store result*
 *; result <== ST0*
```
